title: ==> LF bronze players RANKED <==
body:
Hi there,

I'm looking for bronze players for ranked play. I just transferred my account from NA ( where I was gold 4) to OCE so had to replay placement matches. I currently got placed in bronze 3 and looking to climb up quickly. I main adc and mid as secondary but can also play supp if required.

Must meet below criteria:

+Must have  1:1 ratio of win/losses in ranked play or higher.
+Must cope well under pressure **no raging/flaming others**. Remember this is bronze so there's plenty of bad players out there.
+Decent personality, no little kids, mature players only.
+OPTIONAL I use discordapp for teamspeak so would be nice if you could join me on that.

If this looks like you please add me in game and we can chat thanks.

replies.body: aidan7787 mid jg with 53% Win rate but somehow in b5 don't flame
Ill join you man, add me DUKE0
b3 in promos, looking for a ranked duo main support thresh, and main adc also, I'm 20 and have teamspeak add me in-game
